title: I LOVE LISTS
description: I LOVE LISTS My Mom experienced this on her street. Airbnb expectations vs. reality. The new high-speed trains in France look cool. Street photography in San Francisco. Time travel: NYC in the 1940s. How do two-way mirrors work? What are the best hydrating foods? How cute are these stained glass cacti?? Imagine meditating here. Bob Dylan explains why music is getting worse. We live in a world where pizza-flavored ramen exists. What are the Trader Joeâ€™s Hall of Fame items? Hot dogs have replaced the seafood tower. A case for only buying blueberries frozen. I want to participate in a roasted potato taste test. A mid-century modern home with Japanese influences. I love hearing how people use their wealth for good. Things that used to be banned for women. Did you see my latest organizing post?? Weekend reading: What I Ate in One Year The post I LOVE LISTS appeared first on Shutterbean.
excerpt: I Love Lists is a weekly roundup of the best links from around the internet, curated by Tracy Benjamin of Shutterbean. Discover inspiring reads, creative ideas, delicious recipes, and fun finds every week!
